title.value: Comparative characteristics of results of wintering of selected mirror carp underyearlings
Сравнительная характеристика результатов зимовки сеголетков селекционных зеркальных карпов

journal.title: Belarus Fish Industry Problems : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Tentevitskaya, L.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus). Institute for Fish Industry

abstract.value: Selection work aimed on the creation of new high-productive species of mirror carp is carried out in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. Selective value of created hybrids is analyzed according the main fisheries characteristics, especially wintering. The article contains the results of wintering of cross-breeding underyearlings and purebred species of mirror carp. The most stable combinations of cross-breeding that serve as the basic material for the selection of the Belarusian mirror carp breeds are revealed in the process of comparison of hybrid carp's fishery characteristics. The level of viability of different carp species (purebred and hybrid) is analyzed. Variations in body weight loss of underyearlings of purebred groups are evaluated. Ranging of the most important wintering indexes of experimental groups of mirror carp is presented. Correlation relationships between the major fisheries indicators are determined.
